name: Asteroids (itch) (cmesias)
description:
Description

Asteroids clone made in C++. Game is free but you can donate if you'd like.

Controls

W - Thrust Forward

A - Rotate Left

D - Rotate Right

P - Disable stars

Y - Camera lock or center on map

Space Bar - Shoot

Escape - Menu

Supported Systems
  • Windows
Credits

GFX:
- Background: opengameart.org/content/solar-system
- Purple animation made by Cmesias
- Ship by Cmesias

Audio:
- Music made by Cmesias
- Laser sound made in Bfxr by Cmesias
- Explosion sound made in Bfxr by Cmesias
